title: My Family
subtle: Personal (fiction), 17 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile 40L
description: My Family is a simple book that presents the familiar and comforting subject of family. It teaches and reinforces the printed vocabulary for various immediate family members. Charming illustrations accompany each page of text.
meta: brother, family, father, grandfather, grandmother, me, mother, my, sister
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast information
Consonants : Associate the letter Mm/> with the sound /m/
Nouns : Recognize that some words are naming words (nouns)
